alert.note: Alert for Eastern Ulster; Western Greene; Western Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Ulster and southwestern Greene Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 244 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Fleischmanns to Woodridge. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ellenville, Hurley, Woodstock, High Falls, Kerhonkson, West Hurley, Napanoch, Woodland Valley Campground, West Shokan, Kenneth L Wilson Campground, Phoenicia, Mount Tremper, Lanesville, Olivebridge, Wawarsing, Crawford, Gardiner, Marbletown, Shandaken and Denning. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Ulster; Western Greene; Western Ulster
